channel.title: How many right click options can there be?
channel.description: I'm wondering how many right click options there are such as walk here, attack, trade, follow, etc. I'm wondering this because I was thinking of adding a right click ban. Is there an unlimited amount you can make or just limited? Right now they're all walk here, attack, follow, trade with, and kick. Could I possibly add "Ban" under the kick option?

item.title: How many right click options can there be?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

There’s nothing to show how to make another one. I’ve looked at the codes and tried to trace them back to other codes in the code and see how it’s done and I can’t seem to find it out. Are the right click options in clicking packets…?

Read full topic
item.source: How many right click options can there be?

item.title: How many right click options can there be?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

yes you can. just find out where the others are then make another one. im not telling u the rest because iv never tryed it befor.

Read full topic
item.source: How many right click options can there be?
